title: How to find reliable and cost-effective electronic components - Quora

response.answer_text: Always buy second hand because components have to bed in for a year or so - try eBay or Audiogon best regards paul

Lots of companies will supply comp[onents you can order over the internet. RS Digikey Mouser Racal -for instance. RS can be a bit expensive but gives a free one working day delivery service in the UK.
